price: Emwee! Ntibazokwigera bipfuza urupfu na rimwe kuko bazi neza ukuri kw’Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), n’uko bo barementanya ku kubera ubugarariji bakoze. Burya rero Imana Allah Irazi neza abirenganije mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa yayo, kandi Izobibahembera.
arabic: وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوۡهُ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

meta.transliteration: walan yatamannawhu abadan bimā qaddamat aydīhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-ẓālimīna
